name: Baliri Demon
description: The Baliri Demon is a fearsome fiend with strong physical attributes and a chaotic evil nature. It combines high Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution with a menacing appearance.
memorable: Its ability to sever limbs and unleash a horrifying area-of-effect attack makes it a terrifying opponent.
goals: The Baliri Demon seeks to assert its dominance on the battlefield, using powerful attacks and abilities to cripple foes.
relations: Typically encountered alongside other demons; it may serve a demon lord and inspire chaos among mortals.
environment: Commonly found in areas corrupted by evil or chaos, often in the presence of other fiends.
strengths: High saving throws against spells, strong physical attacks, and the ability to manipulate and empower allies.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical attacks that bypass its high saving throw modifiers.
attacks: Multiattack with a bite that deals piercing and necrotic damage, and pincers that inflict slashing damage with the potential for severe limb severing.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Bray, an area-of-effect attack that deals necrotic damage and stuns nearby foes.
senses: It has a passive Perception of 17, allowing it to notice potential threats effectively.
skills: Skilled in perception (+8), persuasion (+7), religion (+6), and stealth (+8), making it an effective manipulator.
additional_information: Magic Resistance grants it advantage on saving throws against spells.
Damage immunities to poison and resistance to multiple damage types.
Can empower allies with the Praising Brays ability.
